query:
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.user_id,
  s.status,
  s.start_date,
  s.end_date,
  NOW() as current_time,
  CASE WHEN s.end_date >= NOW() THEN 'Valid' ELSE 'Expired' END as validity,
  sp.name as plan_name
FROM subscriptions s
LEFT JOIN subscription_plans sp ON s.plan_id = sp.id
WHERE s.user_id = 1;
